'''Amy Sacilotto''' is a soldier participating in Owen's study on pulmonary fibrosis in veterans.

==History==
Amy was at the hospital getting tests done to participate in Owen's study on pulmonary fibrosis in veterans when an explosion shook the hospital. Amy and the others immediately sought cover and began wondering where the explosion came from. When they recovered from the initial shock, Owen ordered Amy and [[Vinicius Velo]] to help set up a triage area outside the hospital to prepare for the incoming wounded. She later reported that it was quiet except a few firefighters. At the end of the day, Owen thanked them for their help.

==Career==
She is a corporal in the U.S. Army.
